doc:
Lea DeLaria https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lea_DeLaria 0 Lea DeLaria (born May 23, 1958) is an American comedian, actress, and jazz singer. DeLaria is credited with being the first openly gay comic to appear on a late-night talk show with her 1993 appearance on The Arsenio Hall Show. She is best known for her portrayal of inmate Carrie "Big Boo" Black on Netflix original series Orange Is the New Black. Lea_DeLaria ( born May_23_,_1958 ) is an_American_comedian , actress , and jazz_singer . DeLaria is_credited with being the_first_openly_gay_comic to_appear on a_late-night_talk_show with her_1993_appearance on The_Arsenio_Hall_Show . She is_best_known for her_portrayal of inmate_Carrie_"_Big_Boo_"_Black on Netflix_original_series Orange Is the_New_Black .
